sense.gloss: moving to a different location to start a new job, (proceeding to) new appointment
to go in the direction of, to proceed toward, to proceed according to, to repair to, to betake oneself to
to become, to face (facts, circumstances, etc.)
to abide by, to agree to, to consent to, to obey
(intra-company) job transfer away from one's family, unaccompanied posting
place of (new) post, (new) place of appointment
to improve, to get better, to convalesce
employee posted away from their family

sdata.j: しばしば、↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑自↑↓みずか↓ら↑赴↑↓おもむ↓かねばならなかった。
sdata.e: More often than not, she had to go in person.

sdata.j: ↑戦場↑↓せんじょう↓に↑赴↑↓おもむ↓くカメラマンが↑不発↑↓ふはつ↓↑弾↑↓だん↓の↑危険↑↓きけん↓↑性↑↓せい↓を↑知↑↓し↓らないのは↑不思議↑↓ふしぎ↓だ、↑新聞↑↓しんぶん↓↑社↑↓しゃ↓は↑教育↑↓きょういく↓を↑怠↑↓おこた↓ってる。
sdata.e: It is strange that a cameraman heading for a war-zone should not know about the danger of unexploded shells. The newspaper company is being negligent in its training.

sdata.j: ↑今↑↓いま↓↑流行↑↓りゅうこう↓の、↑単身↑↓たんしん↓↑赴任↑↓ふにん↓↑族↑↓ぞく↓の↑淋↑↓さび↓しさを、ちょっぴり↑味↑↓あじ↓わわせてもらったのも、↑有意義↑↓ゆういぎ↓な↑体験↑↓たいけん↓だ。
sdata.e: It was a meaningful experience for me to get a small taste of the loneliness people feel when they've made the now-popular decision to leave their families and work elsewhere.
